summary: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.
cast: Patricia Acevedo|Yamil Atala|Eduardo Borja|Narciso Busquets|Arturo Casanova|Juan Domingo Méndez|Carmen Donadio|Juan Antonio Edwards|Rocío Garcel|Ana María Grey|Emilio Guerrero|Eduardo Liñán|Rocio Prado|Jorge Roig|Manuel Rosano|Armando Réndiz|Carlos Segundo|Esteban Siller|Lilia Sixtos|Alvaro Tarcisio|Velia Vegar|Liza Willert
keywords: foreign language adaptation|based on novel|character name in title
title: Las aventuras de Oliver Twist
